output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: - No CMF number is visible in the post, but this isn't conclusive by itself
2. Refers to Candidate: - Explicitly mentions multiple presidential candidates: * Elena Lasconi (USR) * Marcel Ciolacu (PSD) * Ludovic Orban (Forța Dreptei) - Clear identification of candidates (Article 36(7) - a applies)
3. Addresses Wide Population: - This is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram - Targets a potential audience of 100,001-500,000 people - Clearly addresses the general public - Has received 2,000-2,999 impressions
4. Electoral Objective: - Explicitly promotes voting strategy for presidential elections - Declares support for a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi) - Positions against another candidate (Ciolacu) - Clear electoral objective (Article 36(7) - c applies)
5. Journalism: - This is not journalistic content - It's a political statement and electoral positioning - Doesn't maintain journalistic neutrality or informative purpose
6. Personal Opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an official party position - It's a paid advertisement from a political organization

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This clearly constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - It's a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - It has clear electoral objectives - It's posted by a political party organization - It attempts to influence voting behavior
conclusion.message-for-police: Forța Dreptei - Călărași, prin intermediul Buyer Brain SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propagandă electorală după încheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale. Postarea cu ID-ul 894985495946854 promovează explicit candidatura Elenei Lasconi și denigrează candidatura lui Marcel Ciolacu, având un clear obiectiv electoral și adresându-se publicului larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook și Instagram, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea a avut un impact semnificativ, atingând între 2000 și 2999 de persoane.
